news_header: Luis Rubiales claims Jenni Hermoso consented to a kiss during the Women's World Cup final, while she asserts it was non-consensual.
news_original_title: Rubiales tells court Hermoso consented to World Cup kiss
news_text: Luis Rubiales testified in court that Spanish footballer Jenni Hermoso consented to a kiss during the 2023 Women's World Cup final. He described the kiss as spontaneous and an act of affection, while Hermoso stated she never gave permission and felt the incident tarnished a significant moment in her life. She also reported being pressured to minimize the incident afterward. Rubiales acknowledges his behavior was inappropriate but denies any criminal wrongdoing. The trial continues, with prosecutors seeking a two-and-half year jail term for him.
